title: Mr Boukadoum on a working visit to Spain
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, pays today a working visit to Madrid at the invitation of his Spanish counterpart, Mrs Arancha Gonzalez Laya.
This visit is part of the traditional and regular consultations between the two countries, signatories in 2002, of the "Treaty of Friendship, Good Neighborliness and cooperation."

It also aims to further develop political dialogue and strategic partnership between the two countries on all issues and in all areas of common interest, particularly in the current global context marked by multidimensional crises.
Mr Boukadoum and Spanish counterpart will hold talks. He will also be received by his Majesty King Felipe VI to whom he will transmit a message from President of the Republic Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune.

Mr Sabri Boukadoum will also be received by President of the Spanish Government, Mr Pedro Sanchez, and plans to meet several senior Spanish politicians, notably the president of the Spanish Congress of Deputies, Mr Meritxell Batet Lamana, as well as the 4th vice-president of the Spanish government and Minister of the Ecological Transition and the Demographic Challenge, Mrs Teresa Ribera.
